title: Managers can avoid wasting time
creator_credit: WGBH Educational Foundation and Ashton Peery
brief_description: Schaffer’s Breakthrough Concept in action at the Morgan Guaranty Bank is used as a model to present a four fold strategy to increase management productivity by organising both time and resources effectively to meet the demands of anxiety-producing problems and mobilise more time for priority tasks.
